entry.title: ZpellCatz "Dark Harvest" Update (0.94.0) June '22 + Updated Prologue Trailer
entry.content:
Spell effects have greatly been improved and there is a new version of the Pumpkin Prologue available to give them a try. There's also an updated trailer and a guaranteed epic item drop. Read on.

entry.content:
I polished the spell effects and the environment over the last weeks. Check out the updated trailer and screenshots.

entry.title: ZpellCatz "Great on Deck" Update (0.93.0) April '22
entry.content:
Steam Deck polish for ZpellCatz and more. You can try the changes in the new patch of the Pumpkin Prologue. Want to know what has been changed? Read on.
